SEARCH
程序包 hms.appointments

类 DoctorSchedules

java.lang.Object
hms.appointments.DoctorSchedules
public class DoctorSchedules extends Object
Represents the doctor's schedules, including the management of available slots.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    DoctorSchedules(Doctor doctor)
    Constructs a DoctorSchedules instance for a specific doctor.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • DoctorSchedules

      public DoctorSchedules(Doctor doctor)
      Constructs a DoctorSchedules instance for a specific doctor.
      参数:
      doctor - The doctor whose schedules are to be managed.

  • 方法详细资料

    • setDoctorSchedule

      public void setDoctorSchedule(Date date)
      Sets the doctor's schedule by adding a new DoctorSchedule for the doctor. If a schedule for the specified date already exists, the user is prompted to rewrite it or exit.
      参数:
      date - The date for which to set the schedule.

    • findDateSchedule

      public DoctorSchedule findDateSchedule(Date date, Doctor doctor)
      Finds the doctor's schedule for a specific date.
      参数:
      date - The date for which to find the schedule.
      doctor - The doctor whose schedule is being searched for.
      返回:
      The DoctorSchedule for the specified date, or null if no schedule exists.

    • isDoctorWorking

      public boolean isDoctorWorking(Date date, Time time)
      Checks if the doctor is available at a specific date and time.
      参数:
      date - The date to check availability.
      time - The time to check availability.
      返回:
      true if the doctor is available, false otherwise.

    • printAvailableSlot

      public void printAvailableSlot(Date date)
      Prints available time slots for the doctor on a specific date.
      参数:
      date - The date for which to print available slots.

    • printAvailableSlot

      protected void printAvailableSlot(Date date, DoctorScheduleManager scheduler)
      Prints available time slots for the doctor on a specific date using a given scheduler.
      参数:
      date - The date for which to print available slots.
      scheduler - The DoctorScheduleManager to check slot availability.

    • addSchedule

      public void addSchedule(DoctorSchedule schedule)
      Adds a DoctorSchedule to the list of doctor schedules.
      参数:
      schedule - The DoctorSchedule to be added.

    • getDoctorSchedules

      public List<DoctorSchedule> getDoctorSchedules()
      Returns the list of DoctorSchedules associated with the doctor.
      返回:
      A list of DoctorSchedule objects.
